title: Design and implementation of open badge learning guidelines for digital language learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy, language learning experience, and understanding of fundamental grammarÂ·vocabulary
context.additional_context: A PBL course operating in smartphone-centric, limited technological environments, applying a formative assessment-centered feedback system and focusing on improving learners' reading comprehension and expression skills.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components of open badges (goals, methods, media, assessment) within language learning contexts.
Learners can apply the ASSURE model-based design process for open badge learning activities aimed at improving language proficiency.
Learners can generate language learning project outputs (e.g., writing, presentation materials) using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can simulate expert consensus-building processes using the fuzzy Delphi technique to strengthen language education design competencies.
Learners can propose personalized vocabulary and grammar learning strategies using open badges in digital language learning contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
